name: Innkeeper

aspects.trouble: Knows Too Many Secrets for Their Own Good

stunts: Font of Rumors: +2 to Contacts when gathering information about local events, people, or opportunities
Comfortable Lodgings: Can provide aspect 'Well Rested' to guests (grants +1 to recovery from consequences)
Nobody Causes Trouble Here: +2 to Rapport when defusing conflicts in the inn

trust_clock.description: How much the innkeeper trusts and favors the party

notes: Innkeepers are vital sources of information and safe havens across Skyrim. They hear all the local gossip, know who's hiring, and can point travelers toward opportunities. Building trust with an innkeeper can provide regular updates on local events and preferential treatment.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Friendly, welcoming, uses terms of endearment like 'friend' or 'traveler'
quirks: Has a signature drink or meal
